movies.title: No More School
movies.plot: The last three weeks of school life have begun: After the Abitur, Germany's leaving certificate, the friends and schoolmates of Gymnasium Kerkheim (Kerkheim High) will not see each other again so soon. It is a hard time for Markus and his girl Sandra from a lower grade, as he wants to hang out with his old friends, whereas she wants him to be there for her. It's an even harder time for Dirk, who is to be expelled from school if he fails the math exam that is coming up around midday, and it is the hardest time for Michael, who is a perfect pupil, but has no fun in life at all - and doesn't even know it yet. When Steven calls out a party to celebrate his letter of exemption from the army, they all get together for one of the last real cool events ever.
movies.simplePlot: The last three weeks of school life have begun: After the Abitur, Germany's leaving certificate, the friends and schoolmates of Gymnasium Kerkheim (Kerkheim High) will not see each other ...

biography.birthName: Daniel César Martín Brühl González Domingo
biography.bio: Daniel Brühl was born in Barcelona, Spain. His father was German TV director Hanno Brühl (1937-2010), who was born in São Paulo, Brazil. His Spanish mother was a teacher. He also has a brother and a sister, Oliver and Miriam. Shortly after his birth, his family moved to Cologne, Germany, where he grew up and attended the Dreikönigsgymnasium. Brought up in a fully multilingual home, he speaks fluent German, English, Portuguese, Spanish, French and Catalan.
biography.name: Daniel Brühl

biography.bio: Jasmin Schwiers was born on August 11, 1982 in Eupen, Belgium. She is an actress, known for No More School (2000), Les nouvelles stars (2008) and Morpheus (2016). She is married to Jan van Weyde.
biography.name: Jasmin Schwiers

biography.bio: Niels-Bruno Schmidt was born in 1975 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Pandorum (2009), The Baader Meinhof Complex (2008) and The Country Doctor (1987).
biography.name: Niels-Bruno Schmidt

biography.bio: Mina Tander was born on December 4, 1979 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, West Germany. She is an actress, known for Forgotten (2012), Maria, He Doesn't Like It (2009) and No More School (2000).
biography.name: Mina Tander

biography.bio: Tim Egloff was born on January 31, 1976 in Germany. He is an actor, known for No More School (2000), Neandertal (2006) and Victoire de l'amour (2000).
biography.name: Tim Egloff

biography.bio: Lavinia Wilson was born on March 8, 1980 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress and producer, known for Æon Flux (2005), Alone (2004) and Tandoori Love (2008).
biography.name: Lavinia Wilson

biography.bio: Christian Näthe was born in 1976 in Potsdam, German Democratic Republic. He is known for his work on The Baader Meinhof Complex (2008), Soloalbum (2003) and Unschuldsengel (1994).
biography.name: Christian Näthe

biography.bio: Axel Stein was born on February 28, 1982 in Wuppertal, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Axel! wills wissen (2005), Not My Day (2014) and Hausmeister Krause - Ordnung muss sein (1999).
biography.name: Axel Stein

biography.bio: Sebastian Kroehnert was born on August 17, 1980 in Oberhausen, Germany. He is an actor, known for Ma vie à moi (2001), No More School (2000) and Kleinruppin forever (2004).
biography.name: Sebastian Kroehnert

biography.bio: Denis Moschitto was born on June 22, 1977 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor, known for Chiko (2008), Kebab Connection (2004) and No Regrets (2001).
biography.name: Denis Moschitto

biography.bio: Aaron Hildebrand was born on October 20, 1980 in Berlin, German Democratic Republic. He is known for his work on Les enfants de la colère (2002), No More School (2000) and Il est de retour (2015).
biography.name: Aaron Hildebrand

biography.bio: Bettina Zimmermann was born on March 31, 1975 in Großburgwedel, Germany. She is an actress, known for Airlift - Seul le ciel était libre (2005), The Charlemagne Code (2008) and Bermuda Triangle North Sea (2011).
biography.name: Bettina Zimmermann

biography.bio: Markus Knüfken was born on August 18, 1965 in Essen, Germany. He is an actor, known for Bang Boom Bang - Ein todsicheres Ding (1999), Notruf Hafenkante (2007) and Paradis express (1997). He is married to Andrea Lion. They have two children. He was previously married to Ellen Ten Damme.
biography.name: Markus Knüfken

biography.bio: Michael Hanemann was born on April 8, 1945 in Überlingen, Baden-Württemberg, Germany. He is an actor, known for Mord mit Aussicht (2008), The Princess and the Warrior (2000) and Side by Side (2010).
biography.name: Michael Hanemann

biography.bio: Hubert Mulzer was born in 1944 in Memmingen, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Wave (2008), The Baader Meinhof Complex (2008) and Beyond Silence (1996).
biography.name: Hubert Mulzer

categories.category: Best German Film Shown in Cinetower, Alsdorf (People's Award)

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Best New Director Promotional Award
